refnamediv.refpurpose: A box composed of x min, ymin, xmax, ymax. Often used to return the 2d enclosing box of a geometry.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: box2d is a spatial data type used to represent the enclosing box of a geometry or set of geometries. ST_Extent in earlier versions prior to PostGIS 1.4 would return a box2d.

refnamediv.refpurpose: A box composed of x min, ymin, zmin, xmax, ymax, zmax. Often used to return the 3d extent of a geometry or collection of geometries.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: box3d is a postgis spatial data type used to represent the enclosing box of a geometry or set of geometries. ST_Extent3D returns a box3d object.

refnamediv.refpurpose: A box composed of x min, ymin, zmin, xmax, ymax, zmax. Often used to return the extent of a geometry.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: box3d_extent is a data type returned by ST_Extent. In versions prior to PostGIS 1.4, ST_Extent would return a box2d.

refsection.title: Casting Behavor
refsection.para: This section lists the automatic as well as explicit casts allowed for this data type

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: GEOMETRY is a fundamental postgis spatial data type used to represent a feature in the Euclidean coordinate system.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: GEOGRAPHY is a spatial data type used to represent a feature in the round-earth coordinate system.
